name: Mystletainn 3 [2]
description: The dagger designed by the dwarf master is equipped with a hook that protects the user's hand and is therefore called a Gold Hook Dagger

name: Mystletainn Shard
description: Shard of the legendary artifact: Mystletainn. By collecting rare materials and more debris, with ancient knowledge and legendary Mr. Dragon's skills, you may restore it to the original form.

name: Mystletainn [2]
description: The dagger designed by the dwarf master is equipped with a hook that protects the user's hand and is therefore called a Gold Hook Dagger

name: Nagan [1]
description: There are several blades on the top, which can bring many wounds to the enemy when being attacked.
effect: Str ＋5,When [Bash] at Lv.10, [Bash] deals Extra Dmg to middle-size monsters ＋50%

description: There are several blades on the top, which can bring many wounds to the enemy when being attacked.

name: Name Change Card
description: The blank name change card issued by Adventurer's Guild. Write your favorite name on it will bring the pigeon. Pigeons will fly to Prontera automatically. The administration staff will help change your name when receive the new one~ღ

name: Nannan's Gift
description: A gift from Nannan, what's exactly inside it?

name: Nassi's Sword
description: King Nassi used this sword in his holy war. He used it to sever the heads of innumerable monsters.

name: Nassi's Sword [2]
description: King Nassi used this sword in his holy war. He used it to sever the heads of innumerable monsters.

name: Nature Gloves [1]
description: Nature Gloves, with incredible protective power.

name: Nature Gloves [2]
description: Nature Gloves, with incredible power.

name: Naughty Mask
description: The mask of a naughty face used when children are playing around.

name: Naughty Mask Blueprint
description: The mask of a naughty face used when children are playing around.

name: Naughty Poring Candy
description: A candy in the shape of Naughty Poring, Eating it gives you an amazing speed like wind. Within 1 minute, the wind damage you suffer will reduce by 100%. This effect cannot stack up with other Poring candies, and is not influenced by death. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Navy Beret
description: "Have you ever heard a song from a siren that is invisible in the mist?" The old captain stroked his navy hat. "If you have heard of it, you will be willing to pursue the sea all your life." (thank you very much for your purchase. This beautiful ornament is unavailable on the exchange during the activity, the transaction will be normal after the period. By Ina, July 2017)

name: Necklace of Oblivion
description: Used by assassins to eradicate human emotions. I wonder what you can make with it?

name: Necklace of Wisdom
description: Can predict and see into the distant future. I wonder what you can make with it?

name: Necktie
description: It turns into a reception suit if the necktie matches blush.

name: Necktie [1]
description: It turns into a reception suit if the necktie matches blush.

name: Necktie [1] Blueprint
description: It turns into a reception suit if the necktie matches blush.
